title: Over 680,000 Ethereum Added to Liquid Staking Protocols in Just 28 Days
description: In less than a month, despite a downturn in cryptocurrency markets, over 680,000 ethereum (ETH) has been added to liquid staking derivatives protocols. Lido Finance, the leading liquid staking platform, experienced a supply increase of 5.94%, surging from 7.91 million to 8.38 million ETH since July 29. title: Attacker Makes Away With $400,000 in SVT Flashloan Exploit: Report
description:
Blockchain security firm Certik Alert earlier today reported a flashloan exploit on SVT tokens that resulted in a $400,000 loss. According to the report, the attacker took advantage of a vulnerable contract for SVT trading. The unsuspecting user fell victim to the attack, and lost their funds as a result.
